privacySection1Title: 1. Purpose of Collecting and Using Personal Information
privacySection1Content: Finora does not collect any personal information from users. All financial calculations are performed locally in your browser, and the data you input is not transmitted to any server. Your financial information is stored only on your device and is not shared externally.
privacySection2Content: Finora may collect the following information:
privacyData1: Cookies and Usage Data: We use Google Analytics to collect website visit statistics and improve user experience.
privacyData2: Advertising Data: Anonymized usage information for providing personalized ads through Google AdSense
privacyData3: Technical Information: IP address, browser type, device information, access time, etc. (collected anonymously)
privacySection3Content: Finora uses cookies to improve user experience, save language preferences, and analyze website traffic. You can refuse cookies through your browser settings, but some features may be limited in this case.
privacySection4Content: Finora uses Google Analytics and Google AdSense. These services may collect user data and follow their respective privacy policies. Google's privacy policy can be found at https://policies.google.com/privacy.
privacySection5Content: Finora does not store user data on servers, so there is no risk of data breaches. All calculations are performed locally in your browser.
privacySection6Content: Finora may change this privacy policy as needed. Changes will be posted on this page, and users will be notified of significant changes.
privacyContact: If you have any questions about privacy, please contact us at contact@finora.app.
aboutMissionContent: Finora provides free financial calculator tools that anyone can use easily. Our goal is to help people around the world make better financial decisions. We simplify complex financial calculations so that anyone can easily understand and plan for financial management, investments, loans, retirement planning, and more.
aboutFeature1: Compound Interest Calculator - Simulate long-term investments using compound interest
aboutFeature2: Simple Interest Calculator - Calculate simple interest to predict deposit returns
aboutFeature3: Savings Goal Calculator - Calculate monthly savings needed to reach your goal
aboutFeature4: ROI Calculator - Accurately calculate return on investment
aboutFeature5: Loan/Mortgage Calculator - Calculate monthly payments and total interest to plan your loan
aboutFeature6: Retirement Calculator - Calculate and prepare the funds needed for retirement
aboutFeature7: Inflation Calculator - Analyze future purchasing power considering inflation
aboutFeature8: Tip Calculator - Calculate tips and split bills at restaurants or services
aboutFeature9: Break-Even Point Calculator - Calculate business break-even point to plan your business
aboutBenefit1Content: Use all features for free without registration or login.
aboutBenefit2Content: Supports Korean, English, Japanese, Spanish, Chinese, Portuguese, Thai, and Vietnamese for global users.
aboutBenefit3Content: All calculations are performed locally in your browser, and input data is not transmitted to servers.
aboutBenefit4Content: Works perfectly on all devices including PC, tablet, and smartphone.
aboutBenefit5Content: Uses accurate calculation formulas verified by financial experts to provide reliable results.
aboutTeamContent: Finora is a project developed by withYM with a vision to achieve financial education and financial freedom. We continuously add new features and improve our service based on user feedback.
aboutClosing: Plan a better financial future with Finora!
contactIntro: Thank you for your interest in Finora! If you have any questions or feedback, please feel free to contact us.
contactHoursContent: We typically respond within 24-48 hours on business days.
contactResponseTime: For urgent inquiries, please mark [URGENT] in the email subject.
contactClosing: Your feedback helps make Finora a better service. Thank you!
faqMoreQuestions: If you have more questions, please contact us at contact@finora.app.
faq1Answer: Yes, Finora is completely free. You can use all financial calculators without registration or login.
faq2Answer: Yes, very safe. Finora does not transmit or store the financial data you enter to any server. All calculations are performed locally in your browser, so there is no risk of personal information leakage.
faq3Answer: Finora supports 8 languages: Korean, English, Japanese, Spanish, Chinese, Portuguese, Thai, and Vietnamese. You can change to your preferred language from the language selection menu at the top of the screen.
faq4Question: Can I use it on mobile?
faq4Answer: Yes, Finora has a responsive web design and works perfectly on all devices including smartphones, tablets, and PCs. You can use it directly in your web browser without installing any app.
faq5Question: How do I use the compound interest calculator?
faq5Answer: To use the compound interest calculator, enter the principal amount, annual interest rate, period (years), and monthly contribution. Click the calculate button to see the future value, total contributions, and total interest earned. Compound interest is the effect of earning interest on interest, which can lead to significant returns on long-term investments.
faq6Question: How much do I need for retirement?
faq6Answer: Retirement funds depend on your current age, retirement age, current savings, monthly contributions, and expected annual return. Using Finora's retirement calculator, you can calculate personalized retirement funds. Generally, aim for 70-80% of your pre-retirement income.
faq7Answer: Loan interest is calculated based on the loan principal, annual interest rate, and loan term. Finora's loan calculator automatically calculates monthly payment, total payment, and total interest. It uses the amortization method where you pay the same amount each month.
faq8Answer: Currently, Finora does not provide a calculation result saving feature. If needed, please capture the screen or manually record it. We plan to add calculation result saving and download features in the future.
faq9Question: I want to suggest a new feature.
faq9Answer: New feature suggestions are always welcome! Please send your suggestions to contact@finora.app and we will review and consider them. User feedback is very helpful in improving Finora.
faq10Answer: Finora is a project developed by withYM. It was created with a vision to achieve financial education and financial freedom, and is continuously being improved.
